section.para: Some components have been removed and are no longer provided with UCS 4.0:

listitem.para: The Xen hypervisor has been removed and is no longer supported by UCS. Details on migrating to QEMU/KVM is provided in .

section.title: Network connection for virtual machines
section.para: Newly installed host servers using QEMU/KVM no longer automatically create a bridge network interface by default. This must be setup manually. Further information can be found in Chapter 8 of the UCS manual UCS-Handbuch and in ext-doc-uvmm.
